info.smart_tools.smartactors.core.routers

Class ActorSystemRouter

  • java.lang.Object
    • info.smart_tools.smartactors.core.routers.ActorSystemRouter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MessageReceiver, Router, AsyncService<ComputationalUnitExecutor>, ComputationalUnitExecutor

    public class ActorSystemRouter
extends Object
implements Router, ComputationalUnitExecutor
    Router that forwards messages to corresponding environment where actor is executed.

      • registerEnvironment

        public void registerEnvironment(ActorExecutionEnvironment executor)
        Register executor for actors handlers.
        Parameters:
        executor - executor for handlers (assumed to be single-threaded)

      • registerEnvironmentAwareReceiver

        public void registerEnvironmentAwareReceiver(Target target,
                                             MessageReceiver receiver)
        Add generic receiver that shouldn't belong to any environment. Thus, it will be executed concurrently in the thread which calls receive(IMessage) method.
        Parameters:
        target - target for receiver
        receiver - receiver
